channel.title: How do I make it so NO runes are needed for telports?
channel.description:
How do I make it so NO runes are needed for telports?
I am using a Winterlove source, and it requires runes AND levels in order to telport somewhere. I want to fix this so no runes are needed to telport.

item.title: How do I make it so NO runes are needed for telports?
item.dc:creator: @Narubia Narubia
item.description:
@Narubia wrote:

Well, in things that require some kind of item, there is usually a if (playerHasItem(1436)) there, so thats a check to see whether said player has it n their bag, then there is a deleteItem(1436, getItemSlot(1436), 1); that tells it to remove the item, if you take out the delete item, then it will not remove any runes, but it will still check to see if you have the required runes to cast it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so NO runes are needed for telports?

item.title: How do I make it so NO runes are needed for telports?
item.dc:creator: @Cyph Cyph
item.description:
@Cyph wrote:

What version of server are you using? Also you can always just go to client search for “You do not have the runes to cast this spell” and clear out the code for it. Id save it before you do that although.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so NO runes are needed for telports?
